Translations.Text: They are secure in their Winter and Summer journeys
Let them worship the Lord of this House
who has fed them after hunger, and made then safe after fear
Have you seen the one who denies this faith
For that is the one who drives the orphan away
and does not encourage the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who pray
but, who do not pay attention to their prayer
Those who make a show [of their deeds]
We have given you all that is good in abundance
so pray to your Lord and sacrifice for Him
Your enemy is the one who is cut off
